name: spec-iterator
description: Transform rough requirements into complete technical specifications through AI-powered clarification dialogues

tools.name: spec_start_session
tools.description: Start a new specification clarification session from a rough requirement

tools.name: spec_answer_questions
tools.description: Provide answers to clarifying questions in an active session

tools.name: spec_get_gaps
tools.description: Analyze what information is missing and get recommendations

tools.name: spec_generate
tools.description: Generate the final structured specification document

tools.name: spec_get_status
tools.description: Get session progress and pending questions

tools.name: spec_list_sessions
tools.description: List all active and completed sessions

required.description: Your Anthropic API key for Claude. Get one at console.anthropic.com
